decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposed window on the western elevation would be obscure-glazed. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with condition B.2.(c) (i) and (ii), Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Due to the inconsistency of the submitted plans, officers are unable to determine compliance with B.1 (d) (ii) of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Due to the inconsistency of the submitted plans, officers are unable to determine compliance with B.2.(b(i)(aa)(bb), Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Noting the inaccurate and inconsistent drawings, insufficiently precise and consistent information has been submitted to demonstrate that the development would comply with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
